summary:
### **Capital Raising Announcement Summary**  

- **Structure:** Placement  
- **Capital Raised:** AUD $6.125 million  
- **Issue Price:** $0.11 per share (0.04% premium to 15-day VWAP, 4.3% discount to 10-day VWAP)  
- **Use of Funds:**  
  - Exploration & resource definition at Elizabeth Hill Project  
  - Near-mine and regional drilling  
  - Internal restart studies  
  - General working capital  
- **Key Details:**  
  - Two-tranche issue (Tranche 1 under ASX Listing Rules 7.1 & 7.1A; Tranche 2 subject to shareholder approval)  
  - Lead Manager: CPS Capital Group (receiving 10M options at $0.155 exercise price, expiring in 3 years)  
  - Strong demand led to scale-back of applications  

**No other material information identified.**
